Headline: #95 95th,  #115 Pullman/115th Temporary  Westbound Reroute near 95th/St Lawrence
ShortDescription: WB 95 95th, 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 100th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near 95th St Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #95 95th, #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 100th, King Drive and 95th including the normal route streets at the beginning and end due to street blockage near 95th/St. Lawrence.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Jackson
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are rerouted via Cicero, Madison, Laramie, Harrison, then will resume their normal route on Cicero due to police activity near Cicero/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Madison, Laramie, Harrison, then will resume their normal route on Cicero due to police activity near Cicero/Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.
